rulings.description:
You can have multiple instances of arcane barrier, for example Nullrune Hood, Nullrune Cloak, and Nullrune Gloves.
Arcane barrier can be used every time you would be dealt arcane damage. It's not limited to once per turn.
Each instance of arcane barrier you control can be used 1 time only, each time a source would deal arcane damage to you. For example if a source would deal 5 arcane damage to you, and you control two cards with arcane barrier 1, you will in total be able to prevent 2 arcane damage this source would deal to you.
To fully prevent a card dealing 3 arcane damage, you would require 3 arcane barrier and 3 resources to prevent it. To fully prevent the arcane damage from 3 Runechant tokens (3 instances of 1 damage), you would require 1 arcane barrier and 3 resources to prevent it.
A equipment with arcane barrier does not move to the chain when arcane barrier is used.
You can prevent arcane damage you would deal to yourself.
Players cannot respond to the prevention. Arcane barrier is a replacement effect, not an activated or triggered ability.
You can only pay resources to arcane barrier if a source would deal arcane damage to you.
Preventing arcane damage does not destroy the equipment with arcane barrier (unless otherwise specified).

**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

An action point allows you to play action cards and action activated abilities as they require an action point to play. (Not to be confused with resource points which are used to pay costs)
The boost does not need to be successful. You can use Achilles Accelerator after banishing a non-Mechanologist card from a boost cost.
When this card is destroyed, it is sent to your graveyard.

Achilles Accelerator.text:
**Instant** - Destroy Achilles Accelerator: Gain 1 action point. Activate this ability only if you have **boosted** this turn.

**Arcane Barrier 1** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may pay [Resource] instead. If you do, prevent 1 arcane damage that source would deal.)*

The following are zones in this game: Hero, Weapon, Equipment, Chain, Pitch, Arsenal, Deck, Graveyard, Banished and Arena.
It must be placed face up into a zone from your deck. Revealing it face up on top of your deck does not count as it is not put into a different zone from your deck.

rulings.description:
The item must be chosen before you present your deck.
The card is considered in your deck when counting the minimum sized deck (i.e, once your item is chosen, you can have 59 cards in deck to present in constructed or 29 cards for sealed deck/booster draft).
The item starts with the appropriate counters as though it had entered the arena.
You may elect to not start with an item in play.

printings.name: Zerstreuungsschild
printings.text:
Zerstreuungsschild betritt die Arena mit 4 Dampfzählern auf der Karte.

Zerstöre Zerstreuungsschild zu Beginn deiner Aktionsphase, außer du entfernst einen Dampfzähler von der Karte.

Direkt – Zerstöre Zerstreuungsschild: Das nächste Mal, wenn dein bei diesem Zug einen Schaden erleiden würde, werden X Schäden verhindert, wobei X die Anzahl der Dampfzähler auf Zerstreuungsschild ist.

printings.name: Escudo de disipación
printings.text:
El Escudo de disipación entra en la arena con 4 fichas de vapor.

Al iniciar tu fase de acción, destruye el Escudo de disipación a no ser que le quites una ficha de vapor.

Instantánea - Destruye el Escudo de disipación: la próxima vez que le aplicarían daño a tu héroe en este turno, evita X de daño, donde X es la cantidad de fichas de vapor que hay en el Escudo de disipación.

printings.name: Bouclier de Dissipation
printings.text:
Bouclier de Dissipation entre dans l’arène avec 4 marqueurs de vapeur.

Au début de votre phase d’action, détruisez Bouclier de Dissipation sauf si vous lui retirez un compteur de vapeur.

Instantané – Détruisez Bouclier de Dissipation : la prochaine fois que votre héros subit des dommages ce tour-ci, empêchez X dommages, où X est le nombre de marqueurs de vapeur sur Bouclier de Dissipation.

printings.name: Scudo di Dissipazione
printings.text:
Scudo di Dissipazione entra nell'arena con sopra 4 segnalini vapore.

All'inizio della tua fase d'azione, distruggi Scudo di Dissipazione se non rimuovi uno dei suoi segnalini vapore.

printings.name: 放散シールド
printings.text:
アリーナに出た時のスチームカウンターは4。

スチームカウンターを取り除く場合以外は、アクションフェーズの始めに、このカードを破壊する。

インスタント - 放散シールドを破壊する: このターンで次にヒーローがダメージを受けそうになったら、ダメージXを防御する。Xは、放散シールドのスチームカウンターの数。

rulings.description:
Dissipation Shield requires an action point to play as it is an action.
You may not defend with Dissipation Shield (from your hand) as it does not have a defense value.
If you have multiple damage preventions available, you choose which prevention to apply first.
This can prevent any type of damage, including arcane damage.
This cannot prevent loss of life.
You may activate the instant ability anytime you have priority including when the trigger is on the stack.

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.
The attack action card does not gain go again. Goliath Gauntlet’s activated ability requires an action point to use and provides an action point from go again upon resolution.

printings.name: Helm of Isen's Peak
printings.text:
Action - [1 Resource], destroy Helm of Isen's Peak: Your hero gains +1 [Intellect] until end of turn.
 
Battleworn  (If you defend with Helm of Isen's Peak, put a -1 [Defense] counter on it when the combat chain closes.)

rulings.description:
When you defend with a card it remains on the combat chain until the chain closes, therefore you cannot defend with an equipment multiple times on the same combat chain.
A [-1 defense] counter stays on the card until the card is destroyed or the game ends.
If the defense of a card that is defending is below zero, calculate as if its defense is zero.

The blue symbol is intellect. This is your hand size (How much you draw up to at the end of turn.)
You draw up to your hand size before end of turn effects wear off.
Helm of Isen’s Peak requires an action point to activate. It does not have go again. Activating Helm of Isen Peak will usually end your action phase.
When you defend with a card it remains on the combat chain until the chain closes, therefore you cannot defend with an equipment multiple times on the same chain link.

Helm of Isen's Peak.text:
**Action** - [1 resource], destroy Helm of Isen's Peak: Your hero gains +1[intellect] until end of turn.

**Battleworn** *(If you defend with Helm of Isen's Peak, put a -1[defense] counter on it when the combat chain closes.)*

Herald of Judgment (yellow).name: Herald of Judgment

printings.name: Herald of Judgment
printings.text:
**Prism Specialization** *(You may only have Herald of Judgment in your deck if your hero is Prism.)*

If Herald of Judgment hits, put it into your hero's soul and the defending hero can't play cards from their banished zone during their next action phase. *(Put this card face up under your hero card.)*

**Phantasm** *(If Herald of Judgment is defended by a non-Illusionist attack action card with 6 or more [Power], destroy Herald of Judgment and close the combat chain.)*

artist.blurb:
I am a freelance 2D artist and illustrator based in Astrakhan, Russia. I grew up in Omsk, Siberia. I loved to draw from early childhood, so I studied and graduated from the art faculty in Omsk. 
Working as a freelance illustrator for about 4 years, I have worked with Legend Story Studios, Fantasy Flight Games, Wizards of the Сoast and with private clients. I mostly interested in fantasy and surreal art and I like to experiment and mix styles.
artist.name: Daria Khlebnikova

printings.name: ハイパー・ドライバー
printings.text:
アリーナに出た時のスチームカウンターは3。スチームカウンターがなくなったら、破壊する。

効果　1ターンに1度 - カードをブーストしたら、1スチームカウンターを取り除き、[1 Resource]。

rulings.description:
**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

Hyper Driver requires an action point to play as it is an action.
You may not defend with Hyper Driver (from your hand) as it does not have a defense value.
The effect is not optional, you must remove a steam counter and gain {r} when you boost, including when your boost is unsuccessful.

Hyper Driver (red).text:
Hyper Driver enters the arena with 3 steam counters on it. When Hyper Driver has no steam counters on it, destroy it.

**Once per turn effect** - When you **boost** a card, remove a steam counter from Hyper Driver and gain [Resource].

artist.blurb:
Caravan Studio Artist and Freelance Illustrator - South Jakarta, Indonesia
Indonesian illustrator based in South Jakarta. Studying Animation major at Universitas Multimedia Nusantara.
Interested in 2D illustration and currently going deep into the field.
As what the animation major taught me of creating designs to tell a story, which i try to apply on my illustration.
If you are willing to support my work, visit my other social media and join the journey!

The ability goes on the stack when the combat chain closes.

rulings.description:
When you defend with a card it remains on the combat chain until the chain closes, therefore you cannot defend with an equipment multiple times on the same combat chain.
When this card is destroyed, it is sent to your graveyard.
The ability goes on the stack when the combat chain closes.

Ironrot Plate.text: **Blade break** *(If you defend with Ironrot Plate, destroy it when the combat chain closes.)*

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

The number of cards you place on top and bottom of your deck is known to your opponent, the order of the cards are not.
You may put all of the cards on the top or all of the cards on the bottom if you wish.

**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.
LINKS:
Prints and more: 
https://www.artstation.com/bimawithpencil
Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/_bimawithpencil_
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bimawithpencil
NFT's: 
https://foundation.app/@bimawithpencil
artist.name: bimawithpencil

Lord Sutcliffe.name: Lord Sutcliffe

printings.name: Lord Sutcliffe
printings.text:
**Mentor** *(You may only have Sutcliffe in your deck if your hero is young.)*

At the start of your turn, if Sutcliffe is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

Whenever you play a 'non-attack' action card, deal 1 arcane damage to each hero and put a lesson counter on Sutcliffe for each damage dealt this way. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on Sutcliffe, banish him, search your deck a **specialization** card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.

printings.flavour: ビューン！ビュッ！シュタッ！やっこさんに目に物見せてやりたいって？その時が来たようだ。ベロシテーター60-Tでいまいましい敵を舗道の染みにしてしまえ。
printings.name: マキシマム・ベロシティ
printings.text: このターンで3回以上ブーストした場合に限って、このカードでプレイする。

rulings.description:
**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

You cannot play this card if you have not boosted 3 or more times this turn.
You may still pitch or defend with this card even if you have not boosted 3 or more times this turn.

Maximum Velocity (red).text: Play Maximum Velocity only if you have **boosted** 3 or more times this turn.

artist.blurb:
Hello! My name is Eleonor, I’m from Portugal, and I’m a freelance illustrator and concept character artist.
My weapons of choice are Photoshop and my old and trusty Bamboo Fun Tablet. And I work on Windows 10.
If you enjoy my art, or share my love for chocolate croissants, mountains, and space, please consider supporting what I do - so I can do more of it! Thank you!
artist.name: Eleonor Piteira

Merciful Retribution (yellow).name: Merciful Retribution

printings.name: Merciful Retribution
printings.text:
Whenever an aura or attack action card you control is destroyed, deal 1 arcane damage to target hero. If it's a non-token Light card, put it into your hero's soul. *(Put it face up under your hero card.)*

**Spectra** *(Merciful Retribution can be attacked. When Merciful Retribution becomes the target of an attack, destroy it and close the combat chain. The attack does not resolve.)*

rulings.description:
You can have multiple instances of arcane barrier, for example Nullrune Hood, Nullrune Cloak, and Nullrune Gloves.
Arcane barrier can be used every time you would be dealt arcane damage. It's not limited to once per turn.
Each instance of arcane barrier you control can be used 1 time only, each time a source would deal arcane damage to you. For example if a source would deal 5 arcane damage to you, and you control two cards with arcane barrier 1, you will in total be able to prevent 2 arcane damage this source would deal to you.
To fully prevent a card dealing 3 arcane damage, you would require 3 arcane barrier and 3 resources to prevent it. To fully prevent the arcane damage from 3 Runechant tokens (3 instances of 1 damage), you would require 1 arcane barrier and 3 resources to prevent it.
A equipment with arcane barrier does not move to the chain when arcane barrier is used.
You can prevent arcane damage you would deal to yourself.
Players cannot respond to the prevention. Arcane barrier is a replacement effect, not an activated or triggered ability.
You can only pay resources to arcane barrier if a source would deal arcane damage to you.
Preventing arcane damage does not destroy the equipment with arcane barrier (unless otherwise specified).

Nullrune Gloves.text: **Arcane Barrier 1** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may pay [Resource] instead. If you do, prevent 1 arcane damage that source would deal.)*

Illusionist attack action cards you control have **go again**. *(If an attack is destroyed, go again does not resolve.)*

printings.name: Optekal Monocle
printings.text:
Optekal Monocle enters the arena with 5 steam counters on it. When Optekal Monocle has no steam counters on it, destroy it.

**Action** - Remove a steam counter from Optekal Monocle: **Opt 1. Go again** *(Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.)*

Optokel-Monokel betritt die Arena mit 5 Dampfzählern auf der Karte. Wenn auf Optokel-Monokel kein Dampfzähler liegt, zerstöre die Karte.

Aktion – Entferne einen Dampfzähler von Optokel-Monokel: Sortiere 1 um. Go again (Sieh dir die oberste Karte in deinem Deck an. Du kannst sie unten in das Deck legen.)

printings.name: Monóculo óptico
printings.text:
El Monóculo óptico entra en la arena con 5 fichas de vapor. Destruye el Monóculo óptico cuando ya no tenga fichas de vapor.

Acción - Quita una ficha de vapor del Monóculo óptico: opta 1. Jugar de nuevo (Mira la carta superior de tu mazo. Puedes colocarla en la parte inferior).

printings.text:
Monocle Opteclo entre dans l’arène avec 5 marqueurs de vapeur. Lorsque Monocle Opteclo n’a plus aucun marqueur de vapeur, détruisez-le.

Action – Retirez un marqueur de vapeur de Monocle Opteclo : optez pour 1. Go again (Regardez la première carte de votre deck. Vous pouvez la placer dessous.)

Azione - Rimuovi un segnalino vapore da Monocolo Optekal: Opta 1.Vai di nuovo (Guarda la carta in cima al tuo mazzo. Puoi metterla in fondo.)

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

The number of cards you place on top and bottom of your deck is known to your opponent, the order of the cards are not.
You may put all of the cards on the top or all of the cards on the bottom if you wish.

Optekal Monocle requires an action point to play as it is an action.
You may not defend with Optekal Monocle (from hand) as it does not have a defense value.
You can use the action ability more than once per turn as long as it has a steam counter on it. It is not once per turn.
Using this action requires an empty combat chain. You can close the combat chain after a chain link has fully resolved.

Optekal Monocle (blue).text:
Optekal Monocle enters the arena with 5 steam counters on it. When Optekal Monocle has no steam counters on it, destroy it.

**Action** - Remove a steam counter from Optekal Monocle: **Opt 1. Go again** *(Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.)*

rulings.description:
Cards with dominate cannot be defended with more than 1 card from the defending hero’s hand.
You can still block with equipment and defense reactions played from arsenal in addition to up to 1 card from hand.
Playing a defense reaction from your hand counts towards the 1 card from your hand restriction. You cannot defend with a card in your hand then play a defense reaction from your hand.

Boost (Um Mit Volldampf voraus zu spielen, kannst du als zusätzliche Kosten die oberste Karte aus deinem Deck verbannen. Wenn dies eine mechanologische Karte ist, erhält Mit Volldampf voraus Go again.)

printings.name: Acelerador a fondo
printings.text:
Si Acelerador a fondo da en el blanco, tu próximo ataque en este turno gana dominar. (El héroe que defiende no puede usar más de una carta de su mano para la defensa).

Potenciar (Como costo adicional por jugar Acelerador a fondo, puedes desterrar la carta superior de tu mazo. Si es una carta de Mecanólogo, Acelerador a fondo gana jugar de nuevo).

rulings.description:
Cards with dominate cannot be defended with more than 1 card from the defending hero’s hand.
You can still block with equipment and defense reactions played from arsenal in addition to up to 1 card from hand.
Playing a defense reaction from your hand counts towards the 1 card from your hand restriction. You cannot defend with a card in your hand then play a defense reaction from your hand.

Pedal to the Metal (red).text:
If Pedal to the Metal hits, your next attack this turn gains **dominate**. *(The defending hero can't defend the attack with more than 1 card from their hand.)*

**Boost**

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.
LINKS:
Prints and more: 
https://www.artstation.com/bimawithpencil
Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/_bimawithpencil_
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bimawithpencil
NFT's: 
https://foundation.app/@bimawithpencil

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Santiago, Chile
Chile-based illustrator, focused mainly on fantasy related projects, with experience in producing illustrations for TCG, RPG and tabletop games.
Fantasy illustrator with a background in traditional visual arts with over 6 years of experience in the tabletop gaming industry. 

My work has mainly revolved around fantasy and sci-fi related projects, including role playing games, trading card games and boardgames. I have had the pleasure to work for both big publishers and private commisisoners as a freelancer. Currently working for Legend Story Studios, Onyx Path Publishing, Attack Wagon and Borealis Games, among others,

​My main interests right now lie in the exploration of the imaginative and otherworldy, connecting it to the fantastical and the surreal. Also, my inspirations range from the classical, baroque and romantic artists to modern fantasy and concept art, going through music, literature, mythology and popular culture as well.
artist.name: Marco Gonzàlez

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Santiago, Chile
Chile-based illustrator, focused mainly on fantasy related projects, with experience in producing illustrations for TCG, RPG and tabletop games.
Fantasy illustrator with a background in traditional visual arts with over 6 years of experience in the tabletop gaming industry. 

My work has mainly revolved around fantasy and sci-fi related projects, including role playing games, trading card games and boardgames. I have had the pleasure to work for both big publishers and private commisisoners as a freelancer. Currently working for Legend Story Studios, Onyx Path Publishing, Attack Wagon and Borealis Games, among others,

​My main interests right now lie in the exploration of the imaginative and otherworldy, connecting it to the fantastical and the surreal. Also, my inspirations range from the classical, baroque and romantic artists to modern fantasy and concept art, going through music, literature, mythology and popular culture as well.

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

If this is used on an attack with go again, you will only gain 1 action point upon resolution as multiple instances of *go againdo not stack.
Snapdragon Scaler’s activated ability is an attack reaction. You may activate it during the reaction window when you are the attacking hero.

Snapdragon Scalers.text: **Attack reaction** - Destroy Snapdragon Scalers: Target attack action card with cost [resource] or less gains **go again**.

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Santiago, Chile
Chile-based illustrator, focused mainly on fantasy related projects, with experience in producing illustrations for TCG, RPG and tabletop games.
Fantasy illustrator with a background in traditional visual arts with over 6 years of experience in the tabletop gaming industry. 

My work has mainly revolved around fantasy and sci-fi related projects, including role playing games, trading card games and boardgames. I have had the pleasure to work for both big publishers and private commisisoners as a freelancer. Currently working for Legend Story Studios, Onyx Path Publishing, Attack Wagon and Borealis Games, among others,

​My main interests right now lie in the exploration of the imaginative and otherworldy, connecting it to the fantastical and the surreal. Also, my inspirations range from the classical, baroque and romantic artists to modern fantasy and concept art, going through music, literature, mythology and popular culture as well.

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

You may choose to put no cards from your hand to your arsenal.
Your arsenal must be empty to put a card into your arsenal.

Take Aim (red).text:
The next Ranger attack action card you play this turn gains +3 [Attack].

**Reload** *(If you have no cards in your arsenal, you may put a card from your hand face down into your arsenal.)*

**Go again**

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

You may use the second ability even if it already has one or more steam counters on it, however it will not put a steam counter on it.
You can attack with this weapon more than once per turn provided you have the action points.

The Librarian.name: The Librarian

printings.name: The Librarian
printings.text:
**Mentor** *(You may only have The Librarian in your deck if your hero is young.)*

At the start of your turn, if The Librarian is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

**Once per Turn Effect** - Whenever you create a Spectral Shield token, draw a card and put a lesson counter on The Librarian. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on The Librarian, banish him, search your deck a **specialization** card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.

Mentor (You may only have The Librarian in your deck if your hero is young.)

At the start of your turn, if The Librarian is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

Once per Turn Effect - Whenever you create a Spectral Shield token, draw a card and put a lesson counter on The Librarian. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on The Librarian, banish him, search your deck a specialization card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.

The Librarian.text:
**Mentor** *(You may only have The Librarian in your deck if your hero is young.)*

At the start of your turn, if The Librarian is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

**Once per Turn Effect** - Whenever you create a Spectral Shield token, draw a card and put a lesson counter on The Librarian. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on The Librarian, banish him, search your deck a **specialization** card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Santiago, Chile
Chile-based illustrator, focused mainly on fantasy related projects, with experience in producing illustrations for TCG, RPG and tabletop games.
Fantasy illustrator with a background in traditional visual arts with over 6 years of experience in the tabletop gaming industry. 

My work has mainly revolved around fantasy and sci-fi related projects, including role playing games, trading card games and boardgames. I have had the pleasure to work for both big publishers and private commisisoners as a freelancer. Currently working for Legend Story Studios, Onyx Path Publishing, Attack Wagon and Borealis Games, among others,

​My main interests right now lie in the exploration of the imaginative and otherworldy, connecting it to the fantastical and the surreal. Also, my inspirations range from the classical, baroque and romantic artists to modern fantasy and concept art, going through music, literature, mythology and popular culture as well.
artist.name: Marco Gonzàlez

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

**Boost*is an additional cost. You choose if you want to **boost*or not at the time you play the card.
You may only **boost**once per instance of **boost**.
You are considered to have boosted regardless of whether the **boost**was successful or not.

Zipper Hit (blue).text: **Boost** *(As an additional cost to play Zipper Hit, you may banish the top card of your deck. If it's a Mechanologist card, Zipper Hit gains **go again**.)*
